document.title:
The spectrum of a self-adjoint operator is a compact subset of
R

abstract.name: Abstract
abstract.p:
In these notes I prove that the spectrum of a bounded linear operator from a Hilbert space to itself is a nonempty compact subset of
C
, and that if the operator is self-adjoint then the spectrum is contained in
R
. To show that the spectrum is nonempty I prove various facts about resolvents.

We prove that the spectrum of a bounded self-adjoint operator is real.
